Export.Routine:
#; WD report based on mgstat log #; WD summary report time start, time end, duration, wdphase, wMiB, wblks, AveMBytesPS, AveUpdBlks/GloPS #; WD mgstat annotated report add at right wd summary to the end of phase 5,8 #; report - annotated report
#; extract value #define EV(%1,%2) $zstrip($P(%1,",",%2),"<>"," ","") #define PRECISION(%1,%2) %1*%2\1/%2 Report(log,report="",SummaryReport="",optjw=0) do $SYSTEM.Process.SetZEOF(1) try { if $$unix^stat.lib do sumask^stat.lib("rw-rw-r--") } catch {} close log open log:("RS"):0.1 if $test'=1 B quit close report open report:("NWS"):0.1 if $test'=1 close log B quit if SummaryReport'="" close SummaryReport open SummaryReport:("NWS") if $test'=1 close log,report B quit set NL=$$NL^stat.lib use report W "date,time,GloUpd,dwdq,phyw,wdq,dwdmptq,wdtmpq,GloUpd/BlkUpd,wdphase,duration,MiB,blks,AveMiB/sec,AveUpdGlo/BlkUpd/sec" use SummaryReport W "timeStart,timeEnd,duration,wdphase,wMiB,wblks"_$case(optjw,1:",jwblks",:"")_",AveMiB/sec,AveGloUpd/BlkUpd/sec",! use log read header read statnames set mgstat=##class(stat.type).%New() do mgstat.initmap(statnames)
try { set iwdphase=mgstat.statnameidx("WDphase") set iwdpass=mgstat.statnameidx("WDpass") set iwdqsz=mgstat.statnameidx("WDQsz") set iwdtmpq=mgstat.statnameidx("WDtmpq") set iwijw=mgstat.statnameidx("WIJwri") set iphyw=mgstat.statnameidx("PhyWrs") set ijw=mgstat.statnameidx("Jrnwrts") set igloupd=mgstat.statnameidx("Gloupds") set idate=mgstat.statnameidx("Date") set itime=mgstat.statnameidx("Time") set ijw=mgstat.statnameidx("Jrnwrts") } catch e { B } set istat=0 #; start of pass it is next stat after last wdphase=8 set istart="" set statstart="" set istatwd5start="" set istatwd5end="" set istatwd8start="" set istatwd8end="" set statprevpasswd8end="" set istatprevpasswd8end="" set statprev="" set prevwdphase="" set phywprev="" set sumphyw=0 set sumgloupd=0 set sumgloupdwd5=0 set sumgloupdwd8=0 set sumblkgloupd=0 set wdwqprev="" set wdtmpqprev="" set sumwijw=0 set sumjw="" set flagWD5PhaseEnd=0 set flagWD8PhaseEnd=0 for { use log read stat quit:$zeof=-1 set istat=istat+1 if istat=1 { set stat1st=stat } set date=$$$EV(stat,idate) set time=$$$EV(stat,itime) set wdphase=$zstrip($P(stat,",",iwdphase),"<>"," ","") set gloupd=$zstrip($P(stat,",",igloupd),"<>"," ","") set wijw=$zstrip($P(stat,",",iwijw),"<>"," ","") set phyw=$zstrip($P(stat,",",iphyw),"<>"," ","") set wdwq=$zstrip($P(stat,",",iwdqsz),"<>"," ","") set wdtmpq=$zstrip($P(stat,",",iwdtmpq),"<>"," ","") set jw=$zstrip($P(stat,",",ijw),"<>"," ","") #; start wdphase 5 if wdphase=5 && ( prevwdphase'=5 ) { set statwd5start=stat set istatwd5start=istat set sumwijw=0 set sumgloupdwd5=0 } #; end wdpase 5 elseif wdphase'=5 && ( prevwdphase=5 ) { set statwd5end=statprev set istatwd5end=istat-1 set flagWD5PhaseEnd=1 } #; start wdphase 8 if wdphase=8 && (prevwdphase'=8) { if statprev'="" { set statwd8start=stat set istatwd8start=istat } else { set statwd8start=stat1st set istatwd8start=1 } set sumgloupdwd8=0 set wdq8max=0 set sumjw=0 } #; end wdphase 8 elseif prevwdphase=8 && (wdphase'=8) { set istatwd8end=istat-1 set statwd8end=stat /*set statwd8end=statprev*/ set flagWD8PhaseEnd=1 } set sumphyw=sumphyw+phyw set sumgloupd=sumgloupd+gloupd if wdphase=5 { set sumgloupdwd5=sumgloupdwd5+gloupd } elseif wdphase=8 { set sumgloupdwd8=sumgloupdwd8+gloupd if wdq8max<wdwq set wdq8max=wdwq } set sumwijw=sumwijw+wijw if wdwq>wdwqprev && (wdwqprev'="") { set dublk=wdwq-wdwqprev } else { set dublk=0 } if wdtmpq>wdtmpqprev && (wdtmpqprev'="") { set dutmpblk=wdtmpq-wdtmpqprev } else { set dutmpblk=0 } set ubpg=$case(gloupd,0:0,:dublk/gloupd) set ugpb=$case(dublk,0:0,:gloupd/dublk) set roundugpb=$$$PRECISION(ugpb,100) set sumblkgloupd=sumblkgloupd+ubpg set sumjw=sumjw+jw
if flagWD5PhaseEnd=1 { do phase5end } if flagWD8PhaseEnd=1 { do phase8end } if report'="" { use report W NL W date_","_time_","_gloupd_","_dublk_","_phyw_","_wdwq_","_dutmpblk_","_wdtmpq_","_roundugpb_","_wdphase } set prevwdphase=wdphase set wdwqprev=wdwq set wdtmpqprev=wdtmpq set statprev=stat } #; log end, not completed phase if wdphase=5 { set istatwd5end=istat set stratwd5=statprev do phase5end if report'="" {use report W NL} } if wdphase=8 { set istatwd8end=istat set statwd8end=statprev do phase8end if report'="" { use report W NL } } use 0 close log if report'="" close report if SummaryReport'="" close SummaryReport quit #; linear time of horolog h1*86400+h2 from date time ltime(date,time) public { if date?2N1"/"2N1"/"4N { set hdate=$zdateh(date,1,,,,,,,,1) /* 10th arg=1 indepentent on locale setting */ } elseif date?4N1"-"2N1"-"2N { set hdate=$zdateh(date,3) } if $L(time,".")=2 { set stime=$P(time,".",1) set pstime=$P(time,".",2)} else { set stime=time set pstime=0 } set hstime=$ztimeh(stime,1) set t=+((hdate*86400+hstime)_"."_pstime) quit t } txltime(ltime) public { set hi=$P(ltime,".",1) set hp=$P(ltime,".",2) set t=$zdt((hi\86400)_","_(hi#86400),3)_"."_hp quit t } phase5end if istatwd5start'="" { set t5start=$$ltime($$$EV(statwd5start,idate),$$$EV(statwd5start,itime)) } if istatwd5end'="" { set t5end=$$ltime($$$EV(stat,idate),$$$EV(stat,itime)) } if istatwd5start'="" && (istatwd5end'="") { set dt5=t5end-t5start } else { set dt5="" } set sumwijwmib=sumwijw*2048*128/(1024*1024)+0.5\1 use report W ","_dt5_","_sumwijwmib_","_sumwijw if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W $$txltime(t5start)_","_$$txltime(t5end)_","_dt5_",5,"_sumwijwmib_","_sumwijw_$case(optjw,1:","_sumjw,:"") if +dt5'=0 { set avewijwps=sumwijwmib/+dt5+0.5\1 if report'="" use report W ","_avewijwps if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W ","_avewijwps set wdq5start=$$$EV(statwd5start,iwdqsz) set wdq5end=$$$EV(statwd5end,iwdqsz) set dwdq5=wdq5end-wdq5start if 0 && (sumgloupd'=0){ set aveUpdBlkPerGloPS=dwdq5/sumgloupd use report W ","_aveUpdBlkPerGloPS if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W ","_aveUpdBlkPerGloPS set sumgloupd=0 } if dwdq5'=0 { set aveUpdGloPerBlkPS=sumgloupdwd5/dwdq5 if aveUpdGloPerBlkPS<1 B set RoundAveUpdGloPerBlkPS=$$$PRECISION(aveUpdGloPerBlkPS,100) if report'="" use report W ","_RoundAveUpdGloPerBlkPS if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W ","_RoundAveUpdGloPerBlkPS set sumgloupd=0 } } if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W NL set flagWD5PhaseEnd=0 set flagWD5PhaseDelay=1 quit #; tstart (past 8 phase) tstart 5 tend 5 tstart 8 start 8 end phase8end if istatwd8start="" { set istatwd8start=1 set statwd8start=stat1st } set t8start=$$ltime($$$EV(statwd8start,idate),$$$EV(statwd8start,itime)) set t8end=$$ltime($$$EV(statwd8end,idate),$$$EV(statwd8end,itime)) set dt8=t8end-t8start set sumphywmib=sumphyw*8192/(1024*1024)+0.5\1 if report'="" use report W ","_dt8,","_sumphywmib_ ","_sumphyw if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W $$txltime(t8start)_","_$$txltime(t8end)_","_dt8_",8,"_sumphywmib_","_sumphyw if dt8'=0 { set avewps=sumphywmib/dt8+0.5\1 if report'="" use report W ","_avewps if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W ","_avewps set wdq8start=$$$EV(statwd8start,iwdqsz) set wdq8end=$$$EV(statwd8end,iwdqsz) set dwdq8=wdq8end-wdq8start if 0 && (sumgloupd'=0 ) { set aveUpdBlkPerGloPS=(dwdq8)/sumgloupd if report'="" use report W ","_aveUpdBlkPerGloPS if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W ","_aveUpdBlkPerGloPS } #;if dwdq8<0 B #; this might be in middle of wdphase 8 end if dwdq8<0 { set dwdq8fix=$$$EV(statprev,iwdqsz)-wdq8start if dwdq8fix>0 set dwdq8=dwdq8fix if dwdq8<0 set dwdq8=wdq8max-wdq8start } if dwdq8<0 B ; still bad wdq growth during phase 8 if dwdq8'=0 { set aveUpdGloPerBlkPS=sumgloupdwd8/dwdq8 set RoundAveUpdGloPerBlkPS=$$$PRECISION(aveUpdGloPerBlkPS,100) if report'="" use report W ","_RoundAveUpdGloPerBlkPS if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W ","_RoundAveUpdGloPerBlkPS } } if SummaryReport'="" use SummaryReport W NL set sumwij=0 set sumphyw=0 set flagWD8PhaseEnd=0 quit
#; merge wd report with os disk stat MergeOSDisk(wdlog,mergewdlog,disklog,selectdisk,selectstat) open wdlog:("RS") open disklog:("RS") use wdlog use disklog read diskstatenext for { use wdlog read wdstat
use diskstat set diskstat(1)=diskstatnext set i=1 for { read stat quit:log if $P(stat,",",1)="" set diskstatnext=diskstat set diskstat(i)=diskstat set i=i+1 } set t=$P(diskstat(1),",",1) #; decide where include
} quit #; fraction FracPrecisionMD(value,precision) if value<1 && (value>0) { set fraction=$P(value,".",2) set len=$L(fraction) for i=1:1:L { quit:$E(fraction,i)'=0 } set o=i set roundfraction=$E(fraction,o,o+precision-1) if $e(fraction,o+precision)'>5 set roundfractionnew=roundfraction+0.5\1 if $L(roundfructionnew)=$L(roundfraction) { } } quit
